GoalDescription: A nation which utilises and sustainably manages our land, water and natural resources
PolicyObjectiveDescription: Strengthen local authorities and municipal planning authorities to enact and enforce land use planning laws and regulations
IndicatorDescription: Proportion of declared physical planning areas that have a physical plan
ComputationMethod: (The number of declared physical planning areas that have a physical plan)/( the total number of declared physical planning areas) * 100
Concept: Key component of urban development initiatives and sets the boundaries that may detailed project must adhere to – such as the legal and technical guidelines that should be followed.
DataSource:
* Department of Local Authorities.

* Vanuatu Municipal council.

* Ministry of Lands & Natural Resources.

* Department of Environment protection & conservation.
Definition: Set of actions aimed at improving the physical, social and economic welfare of a place and its dwellers. It is the organization of land uses so that people enjoy the highest achievable degree of efficiency in resource utilization, functionality of places.
IndicatorShortName: Physical Plans for Physical Planning Areas
Rationale:
* Helpful in fight against urban and rural poverty

* Helps to address environmental problems

* Helps to maximize the use of land and other resources
TargetDescription: 100% of all physical planning areas declared in or before 2016 have a physical plan in place
